oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show 1948-04-29 Disc #5 & 6
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson Radio Show. Original recording date is April 29, 1948. Thompson is backed by his Brazos Valley Boys. Recordings are labeled as Disc #5 and Disc #6 respectfully.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) After Tomorrow (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (01:38) Don't Pass on the Double Strip (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (03:30) Just a Little Old Rag Doll (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (06:30) Sixteen Tons (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (08:43) Letter Edged in Black (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (11:35) Teach me to Forget (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (13:19) Take me Back Into your Heart (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (15:38) That Little Boy of Mine (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (18:34) Take it Back and Change it for Another (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (21:09) Desert Jewels (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:31) Don't You Feel Sorry (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (25:52) Easy Rocking Chair (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank;
